content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Describe the author’s purpose in writing the passage. b) Explain one way in which the author’s point of view reflects his historical situation. c) Explain one way in which the passage reflects the spread of Enlightenment ideas.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
